name: osu! old site, new style
description: Inspired by this reddit post, I spent 8 hours creating something like it I hope you're all happy, this was a mess to make Loads images from: https://osu.ppy.sh/images/backgrounds/page-light.png https://osuskinner.com/elements/interface/ranking/2879/13351.png
additional_info:
quick update 1: fixed tablist:visited

- added osu!plus compatibility, load on old.ppy.sh
- inverted more images
- added all ranking pages to the ranking page category
- added beatmap pack list to beatmap page category
- made header 1px taller to cover purple line
-added more osu!plus compatibility: beatmap info on user pages, custom F icon, recent scores
